thread.title: Noble Group Winding Down Copper, Zinc Trading
thread.title_full: Noble Group Winding Down Copper, Zinc Trading - WSJ

author: Ese Erheriene
title: Noble Group Winding Down Copper, Zinc Trading
text:
LONDON—Commodities trading giant Noble Group Ltd is winding down its exposure to some metals and focusing on what it says is a profitable energy business as it addresses the global resources rout that has made the Singapore-listed firm a big focus for investors looking for casualties amid the carnage.
Noble’s share price has fallen more than 60% this year amid the declines in the metals, coal and energy markets it trades in, and as analysts criticize its accounting practices. This is making the banks that finance Noble... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
